<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defiled Costa](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1793)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 177</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This still-bloody rib was taken from a priest of [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19) at the moment they passed into undeath and has a constant stench of decay. The first time any creature critically fails its saving throw against a [_mask of terror_](/Spells.aspx?ID=185) spell cast using this catalyst, it also takes 6d10 mental damage, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save against the spell's DC, as it lives through the memory of having its rib torn from its body. Once any creature takes this damage, the defiled costa's effect ends, and no other creatures take the damage, even if they critically fail.

</column>

A creature who critically fails against this save is killed instantly. This effect has the [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) trait.
